description: Level up your pumpkin soup. Serve it in a crusty bread bowl and top it all off with fresh, homemade pesto.
keywords: Pumpkin Soup Cob With Basil Pesto
name: Pumpkin Soup Cob With Basil Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Ladle warm soup into cobs and swirl 1 tbs pesto into each. Top with extra pine nuts and serve with cob tops.
